title: Vic & Bob's Big Night Out
overview: Vic Reeves and Bob Mortimer burst onto our screens with a hilarious non-stop half-hour of mischief, fun and mayhem.There are sketches, songs, eye-popping special effects, ridiculous fights and clever stunts packed into this fast-paced studio show. Fans will rejoice at the return of some old favourites, including Novelty Island - and the contestants entering the paddock this series will certainly not disappoint.The four part series also features some special guests, including the incredible pop singer George Ezra, who proves he is a dab hand with a hammer and nails in Novelty Island, before trying to perform his number one hit single Shotgun.
